info.name: LLM Appointment API - Simplified
info.description: Simplified API endpoints designed for LLM function calling (OpenAI, Claude, etc.)

request.description:
Check available appointment slots for a specific date.

LLM Use Case: When patient asks 'What times are available tomorrow?'

Parameters:
- date: YYYY-MM-DD format

Response includes:
- List of available time slots
- Count of available slots

Book an appointment for a patient. Automatically creates Google Calendar event with Meet link.

LLM Use Case: When patient says 'Book me for tomorrow at 10 AM'

Required Parameters:
- email: Patient's email
- date: YYYY-MM-DD format
- time: HH:MM format (start time)

Optional:
- note: Reason for appointment

Response includes:
- Appointment ID
- Google Meet link
- Calendar link

Get all upcoming appointments for a patient.

LLM Use Case: When patient asks 'What are my appointments?'

Parameters:
- email: Patient's email

Response includes:
- List of appointments
- Date, time, status
- Google Meet links

Cancel a patient's appointment. Automatically deletes Google Calendar event.

LLM Use Case: When patient says 'Cancel my appointment'

Parameters:
- email: Patient's email
- date: Appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD)

Automatically:
- Cancels appointment
- Deletes calendar event
- Releases time slot
- Sends cancellation email

Reschedule an existing appointment to a new date and time.

LLM Use Case: When patient says 'Reschedule to tomorrow at 2 PM'

Parameters:
- email: Patient's email
- currentDate: Current appointment date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- newDate: New date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- newTime: New start time (HH:MM)

Automatically:
- Updates appointment
- Updates Google Calendar event
- Releases old slot
- Books new slot
- Sends update email
